skill.name: cto-advisor
skill.description: Technical leadership guidance for engineering teams, architecture decisions, and technology strategy. Includes tech debt analyzer, team scaling calculator, engineering metrics frameworks, technology evaluation tools, and ADR templates. Use when assessing technical debt, scaling engineering teams, evaluating technologies, making architecture decisions, establishing engineering metrics, or when user mentions CTO, tech debt, technical debt, team scaling, architecture decisions, technology evaluation, engineering metrics, DORA metrics, or technology strategy.
skill.summary: Technical leadership guidance for engineering teams, architecture decisions, and technology strategy...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation and Python calculation scripts with no file system access, network calls, or command execution. All scripts use only standard library imports and accept data via function parameters.

content.user_title: Lead engineering teams with strategic frameworks
content.value_statement: Engineering leaders need structured approaches to technical debt, team scaling, and architecture decisions. This skill provides calculators, templates, and frameworks to make data-driven leadership decisions and track engineering excellence through DORA metrics.
actual_capabilities: Calculate optimal team structures and hiring plans for engineering growth
Analyze technical debt across architecture, code quality, infrastructure, security, and performance
Apply Architecture Decision Record (ADR) templates for documenting architectural choices
Evaluate technology vendors using structured criteria matrices and frameworks
Track DORA metrics: deployment frequency, lead time, MTTR, and change failure rate
Generate budget projections for team expansion and technology investments
limitations: Does not access or analyze actual code repositories
Does not integrate with project management tools or CI/CD systems
Does not collect real-time metrics from production systems
Requires manual input of current state data for analysis

use_cases.title: Quarterly Planning
use_cases.description: Prepare technology strategy presentations, budget proposals, and team expansion plans for executive discussions.

use_cases.title: Team Health Assessment
use_cases.description: Evaluate team balance, productivity metrics, and identify areas needing attention in sprint planning.

use_cases.title: Architecture Decisions
use_cases.description: Document technical decisions using ADR templates to maintain institutional knowledge and explain choices.

prompt_templates.title: Quick Analysis
prompt_templates.scenario: Need fast assessment of technical situation
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the CTO Advisor skill to analyze our current technical debt and provide prioritized actions. We have a [monolithic/serverless/microservices] architecture with [X] engineers.

prompt_templates.title: Scaling Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a team scaling plan for growing from [current_size] to [target_size] engineers over [timeframe] quarters. Consider [US/EU/APAC] location for budget calculations.

prompt_templates.title: Vendor Evaluation
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me evaluate [technology category] vendors using the technology evaluation framework. Key requirements are [list requirements] with budget constraint of [amount].

prompt_templates.title: Full Assessment
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a comprehensive engineering health check. Analyze our current team structure, technical debt level, DORA metrics performance, and provide a quarterly improvement roadmap with budget estimates.

output_examples.input: Analyze our current technical debt for a legacy e-commerce platform with 8 engineers, high system criticality, rapid growth phase, and compliance requirements.
output: Category Breakdown: Architecture: 75, Code Quality: 65, Infrastructure: 57, Security: 78, Performance: 55
Risk Assessment: High - System failure risk increasing, Developer productivity declining, Innovation velocity blocked
Top Priority Actions: Security (Priority: 100) - Immediate security audit, Week 1: Implement secrets management, Month 1: Set up vulnerability scanning
Strategic Recommendations: Allocate 25-30% of sprints to debt reduction, Establish technical debt budget, Engage security audit firm

best_practices: Input current team data including role distribution, velocity, and attrition rate for accurate scaling calculations
Combine quantitative metrics (DORA, productivity index) with qualitative team feedback for holistic assessments
Review and update technical debt analysis quarterly to track progress and adjust priorities
anti_patterns: Using metrics to penalize individual performance instead of improving team processes
Ignoring team balance signals like high manager-to-engineer ratios or skill gaps
Making technology decisions based solely on cost without considering long-term maintenance and scalability

faq.question: What AI tools is this skill compatible with?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Provides frameworks and calculations that any AI assistant can apply.

faq.question: What inputs does the tech debt analyzer need?
faq.answer: Category scores (0-100) for architecture, code quality, infrastructure, security, and performance. Team size and system criticality level.

faq.question: Can this integrate with my existing tools?
faq.answer: The skill provides frameworks and calculations. Integration with Jira, GitHub, or metrics tools requires manual data transfer.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using these scripts?
faq.answer: Yes. Scripts run locally with no network access or data transmission. All calculations happen in memory on your machine.

faq.question: How accurate are the budget projections?
faq.answer: Projections use industry average salary bands for US, EU, and APAC regions. Adjust based on your specific location and market conditions.

faq.question: How is this different from hiring consultants?
faq.answer: Provides structured frameworks at no cost. Complements but does not replace expert judgment for complex strategic decisions.
